column1: Exercise helps to prevent future back pain: - Exercise a little every day.
Follow these steps when you bend and lift to help prevent back pain and injury: - Spread your feet apart to give your body a wide base of support.
- Bend at your knees, not at your waist.
- Squat as you set the object down, using the muscles in your knees and hips.
A brace may help prevent injuries for workers who have to lift heavy objects.
